personal.name: Varshini Loganathan

personal.about: Triple-majoring in Computer Science, Artificial Intelligence, and Operations Research at Rice University. Focused on robotics and machine learning, with a passion for expanding access to technical education. Experienced in software engineering, hackathon leadership, and technical community mentorship.

description: Provide Level 1 technical support for 10,000+ Canvas LMS users, resolving 50+ issues weekly.

Collaborate with organizers to maintain technical infrastructure, resolve blockers, and support event logistics.
Create sponsor demos (GitHub Copilot, Google Gemini, Roo Code) to drive adoption and evaluate advanced usage.
Design and host monthly workshops (6+ hours) on data structures and ML, reaching 5,000+ developers.
Lead planning and execution of a 36-hour hackathon with 500+ participants and 20+ sponsors annually.
Mentor a team of 10+ organizers across marketing, logistics, and sponsorships.
Secure and manage sponsorships with top companies including Chevron, Capital One, and Intel.
Develop programming with workshops, six competition tracks, and beginner coding templates.
Oversee budget, negotiate contracts, and manage resources for maximum event impact.
Built a full-stack intelligent sales agent, reducing manual reporting time by 80% for enterprise users.
Redesigned legacy search into an LLM-powered interface, improving query efficiency by 99%.
Engineered scalable natural language query interface using Apex and LLM parsing for CRM datasets.
Selected in top 3% for Uber Career Prep Program.
Completed 40+ hours of technical training including mock interviews and workshops.
Received 1-on-1 mentorship from Uber engineers to strengthen interview and coding performance.
